articles.title: Hate crimes bill to fight Asian American discrimination clears final vote, heads to Biden's desk - USA TODAY
articles.description: Violence against those in the AAPI community has grown despite increased national attention and political action against anti-Asian hate.
articles.content:
Congress later approved legislation intended to curtail a rise in hate crimes against Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Tech firm Sea to scale up digital financial services as revenues double to US$1.8 billion - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: Singaporean technology group Sea chairman Forrest Li said on Tuesday (May 18) the firm would scale up its fintech offerings in Southeast Asia, as the firm more than doubled revenues in 2021 thanks to growth in e-commerce and entertainment.

articles.title: Volcanoes on Mars Could Still be Active, New Study Suggests - IGN Southeast Asia
articles.description: The latest information shows evidence of volcanic activity in the last 50,000 years.
articles.content:
Scientists have uncovered a relatively recent history of volcanic activity on Mars, which could suggest that the Red Planet is still volcanically active.
